verses.name: Exodus 28:1
verses.text: And take thou unto thee Aaron thy brother, and his sons with him, from among the children of Israel, that he may minister unto me in the priest’s office, even Aaron, Nadab and Abihu, Eleazar and Ithamar, Aaron’s sons.

verses.name: Exodus 28:2
verses.text: And thou shalt make holy garments for Aaron thy brother for glory and for beauty.

verses.name: Exodus 28:3
verses.text: And thou shalt speak unto all that are wise hearted, whom I have filled with the spirit of wisdom, that they may make Aaron’s garments to consecrate him, that he may minister unto me in the priest’s office.
